nodes.text: Star Wars: Rogue One Profiles and Poster Book

Star Wars: Rogue One Profiles and Poster Book is a book dealing with the profiles of various characters from Rogue One: A Star Wars Story. Including twelve posters and forty stickers, it was released by Egmont UK Ltd on December 16, 2016.
A bumper poster book featuring the heroes and villains of Rogue One: A Star Wars Story, packed with posters and stickers.
